description: Simple todo application with task management and filtering

userStories.title: Add tasks table to database
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a database schema to store tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Create tasks table with columns: id, title, description, status, created_at
Status column accepts: 'pending' | 'in_progress' | 'done' (default 'pending')
Generate and run migration successfully
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create task CRUD server actions
userStories.description: As a developer, I need server actions to create, read, update, and delete tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: createTask(title, description) creates a new task with status 'pending'
getTasks() returns all tasks ordered by created_at desc
updateTask(id, data) updates task fields
deleteTask(id) removes a task
Typecheck passes
Tests pass

userStories.title: Display task list on main page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see all my tasks on the main page.
acceptanceCriteria: Main page shows list of all tasks
Each task displays title, description, and status badge
Empty state shown when no tasks exist
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add new task form
userStories.description: As a user, I want to add new tasks from the main page.
acceptanceCriteria: Form with title (required) and description (optional) fields
Submit button creates task and refreshes list
Form clears after successful submission
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add status toggle to task cards
userStories.description: As a user, I want to change task status directly from the list.
acceptanceCriteria: Each task card has a status dropdown
Dropdown options: Pending, In Progress, Done
Changing status saves immediately without page refresh
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Filter tasks by status
userStories.description: As a user, I want to filter the task list by status.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter dropdown above task list with options: All, Pending, In Progress, Done
Selecting a filter shows only matching tasks
Filter selection persists in URL query params
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
